values: Check out my myspace for the epiphany of the year.... i said it. i meant it. EEEEEEEEEEE.

So, things going good lately. I've decided to leave my current place of employment. It sucks. I'm out. That's it.

My boy is very very close to moving in. This is moving too fast right? Fuck you. That's to everyone who said "yes". I look at it this way. Life's short, if you can find someone who makes you happy and you know its going to last only for a minute... why skip it? I'm not gonna. He could dump me in 6 months and I'd be happy I moved him in and played house.. fun while it lasted right. Right.

I so have nothing else to talk about in here anymore do i? didnt think so. Peace out.

Na na na na na

Happy happy happy.

He's mine. Yup... very much so. He called me "his boy"... i'm someone's boy! EEEEE! 

Ok, i'm being a little childish about this right?

EEEEEEEEE!

Sorry, last time I swear.




Now for PIF world domination!!!!




Speaking of PIF it would be oh so wonderful if she would come over asap and lemme tell her all the juicy details about my... mini blinds.. yes.. mini blinds.... call me dear.

So much has happened since I last wrote. Everyday with the most incredible person I've ever met... this could get ugly huh? I'm a little obsessed I'll admit. And yes, that's usually the down fall with the guys I want to be with right? Not this time. Here's why, the old way I lived went like this...
1) find a boy
2) screw him
3) cling to something about him that was never there
4) get shot down
5) become slut for a few months
       RINSE AND REPEAT

I've done that 3 times now. for 3 years I've chased guys that werent interested in my in the least.  Last week I made a desicion to restart the cycle, but was held up by a guy who literally made me halt and evaluate what was going to happen. Now I have a this new found look on life and I know that no matter what happens with B. I'm gonna be ok, and I'm not starting that cycle over again. It's problematic. It forces me into a dark place that I wont go back to. Right now dark is just a concept I dont understand.

Work is hell. Other things could be so much better, but who cares. He's here. I know, this is a little too lovey dovey gross right, but oh well. HEAD OVER HEELS BABY! I'm talking ob-fucking-sessed right now. It's ok to admit it.. you're jealous.

SOTD.

"All you got is this moment
Ttwenty-first century's yesterday
You can care all you want
Everybody does yeah that's okay

So slide over here
And give me a moment
Your moves are so raw
I've got to let you know
I've got to let you know
You're one of my kind

I need you tonight
'Cause I'm not sleeping
There's something about you girl
That makes me sweat

How do you feel
I'm lonely
What do you think
Can't take it all
Whatcha gonna do
Gonna live my life"

So 2 days and already I'm sold. It's what I want and I want to know how to get it.... i dont think i fully do. It's going fast but in a slow motion way. I dont wanna give away too many details b/c I wanna keep this between me and whoever I tell, but damnit I'm gonna burst!

I need my PIF to come let me tell her details.... she'll underdstand most of all the power of a boy :)
Oh my, i've forgotten about this! I've been so wrapped up in Myspace... fucking slut. Hmm, well ok, I dont have anything cool to say right now, go to my myspace if ya want something hot.

Ok, time for a real entry huh? Sure. Well not much goin' on. Of course date night tomorrow, and C-Street Saturday! So excited for that, popping Sir B's cherry on a gay bar.. woohoo! Should be a fun weekend, which I'll need with the extra hours I'll be working in the next few weeks. 

Losing weight again. I'll prolly gain it back next week eh? I dont care anymore. Since my birthday just happened I'm old and unwanted anyways hahaha. 

Speaking of being unwanted, is it sad that Ashlee's new album is prolly the only thing I listen too? Yeah I thought so, damnit I hate annoying chicks with bad voices, they rule.

Wow, i'm not that good at entries anymore, nothing to talk about.

SOTD:

christopher lydon

clutching the phone till my hands were sore
i never understood pain before, christopher
you cannot know what it does to me
hearing you speak with this frequency 

i never knew what one voice could do
i was in heaven the moment i heard you
my friends go out drinking and having fun -
i stay in bed with my headphones on 

shot down with arrows from waves above
christopher lydon renounced my love

it took so long to get through to you
i never understood sorrow, and now i do
i finally got past your moniter,
and you broke my heart in two, chrisopher

christopher, i am your listener, christopher,
i've never felt love like this before, christopher,
christopher, now and forevermore, chrisopher
i'll never stop saying christopher, christopher

finally i knew what i had to do
christopher i had to make the connection with you
i dont care that you could be my father, dear chistopher
i will be yours til the bitter end........

so during a show about joan of arc
i got through - i said:
"christopher lydon, you've stolen my heart"
when i asked if you felt the same way for me
you cut me off like a guillotine

drawn like a bull to a matador-
i just see visions of chrisopher
shot down by arrows from waves above
christopher lydon renounced my love

christopher, i was your prisoner, christopher,
i hope you're happy now chistopher
thank you for everything but i'm not listening anymore nor do i plan to contribute to NPR
christopher what do you take me for i'm not just any old talk show host groupie....
oh christopher.....is there a chance for me?
christopher...beautiful, beautiful christopher....beautiful, beautiful, beautiful christopher....

So what's going on journal? Long time no see.

thanks for the visit, gotta go!

Ariel

Which DISNEY character are you most like?
brought to you by Quizilla Now the song of the day is the one I sang that one day I decided... I want more. Look at this stuff Isn't it neat? Wouldn't you think my collection's complete? Wouldn't you think I'm the girl The girl who has ev'rything? Look at this trove Treasures untold How many wonders can one cavern hold? Lookin' around here you'd think (Sure) she's got everything I've got gadgets and gizmos aplenty I've got whozits and whatzits galore (You want thingamabobs? I got twenty) But who cares? No big deal I want more I wanna be where the people are I wanna see Wanna see 'em dancin' Walkin' around on those (Whad'ya call 'em?) oh - feet Flippin' your fins you don't get too far Legs are required for jumpin', dancin' Strollin' along down a (What's that word again?) street Up where they walk Up where they run Up where they stay all day in the sun Wanderin' free Wish I could be Part of that world What would I give If I could live Outta these waters? What would I pay To spend a day Warm on the sand? Betcha on land They understand Bet they don't reprimand their daughters Bright young women Sick o' swimmin' Ready to stand And ready to know what the people know Ask 'em my questions And get some answers What's a fire and why does it (What's the word?) burn? When's it my turn? Wouldn't I love Love to explore that shore above? Out of the sea Wish I could be Part of that world

Wow, so I waited entirely too long to update this shit huh? Well yeah, avoiding writing something, instead got it out other ways :). So, what else has been going on? Well 21 isnt all that its cracked up to be, slower than 20 it seems. I dont think its all that great, my I.D. picture sucks. I guess all that really works about it is that I can drink in public, thats not bad.  

Oooh, had my vacaction, that was nice, came back to a pile of steamy you know what. Then got into it with a certain person there... yes that one, my new arch-nemesis now that Little Miss S. is gone. I wish people would quit, seriously, screw me over, it would make me feel ok seriously. Speaking of which, I need to get back up there and finish up for the day.

Birthday is fast approaching. 2 days. Yippee. I'm having a meeting tomorrow, should be interesting. I'm just so sick of not being respected. I am nothing but honest, respectable, and kind to those people and they walk on me... its 'bout time I said something about that. Too bad its right before the vacation.. hopefully I'll have employees when I return.

So i got this present this morning. I loved it. Adored it. Adored who left it. However I will say this... it scared the SHIT outta me. I was having a panic attack all the way to work cuz of the initial shock. Even though I knew who left it.. i went outside and heard this like scream/howl... jumped in my van, saw something moving behind me, slammed the gas and got outta there. Seriously thought I was being set up.

I shall return, maybe tomorrow, maybe on my b-day to write that inevitable entry I dont want to.

I'm definetly considering moving outta Morton. Peoria, cant... job wont let me. I wanna take off. Somewhere cool like Utah.. oh yeah Mormon's are hot.. right? Good.

3 days till 21. I'm kinda excited, kinda not. Will be interesting depending on my financial situation. Which is getting better by the paycheck. Slowly but surely getting caught up with everything. Hopefully a car is in my future.

Well I'm getting sleepy cuz I'm trying to update this shit while doing a hundred other things. 

I'll be back in a few days.

6 days.

So the haunted house was fun, got a couple of people shitting their pants, well one actually. Good day today, hired someone, got ALOT of work done, gotta get prepared for the suits coming soon. It's gonna rock. I'm very work oriented right now, I complain alot but the bottom line is that I love my job to death and not many people can say that about much. It prolly disgusts people but the thing is that, this is my career, at least for now. I have a future here and its very fuckin' bright. 2 years, then I'm planning another promotion. 5 years, another one. By the time I'm 28 I will be making more than the majority of my graduating class that went to college. Maybe I'm jumping the gun, but if there is one thing I'm good at its jumping the gun.

Gah, new subject, thats all I talk about. So the Rivermen, thank god they are back on track cuz if I have to watch one more game like the last I'm gonna have to beat some boys up... and i have a friend with the tits to do it! I need to clean my house so bad, like REALLY bad. And i need a new car, 10 to 1, i get a car before i get my house cleaned :)

Ok, time to bounce.

My dad's having alot of trouble right now. His "wife", if you believe they had a marriage, is a piece of shit. Most of you know the details, and I'll post them here eventually I imagine. I just feel really bad for him. Long life of kicks in the crotch. Makes me afraid of having something with someone. I dont wanna be my father. I dont want that stress. Of course I suppose it shouldn't be stressful should it? It would be. I know me too well. Its just, damnit, why is she such a slut. Grr.

Pretty sad today. Not sure why, just am. Not much going on since I last wrote. Work's been insane. Everyone and their mother has put in their notice! But hey, fuck it. And.. my boss' boss will at my store next week. Talk about pressure.

I've got a hot date tomorrow... with Mandy, should be... interesting. Cuz yeah, Me and hockey, not something you really would put together right? Right.

So I dont really have much to say today, well I do, but I wrote most of it in the written so it's not needed here.

Song of the day anyone?

                                                                                                        bad habit

biting keeps your words at bay
tending to the sores that stay
happiness is just a gash away
when i open a familiar scar
pain goes shooting like a star
comfort hasn't failed to follow so far...

and you might say it's self-indulgent
you might say its self-destructive
but, you see, it's more productive
than if i were to be healthy

and pens and penknives take the blame
crane my neck & scratch my name
but the ugly marks
are worth the momentary gain...
when i jab a sharpened object in
choirs of angels seem to sing
hymns of hate in memorandum

and you might say it's self-indulgent
and you might say it's self-destructive
but, you see, it's more productive
than if i were to be happy

and sappy songs about sex and cheating
bland accounts of two lovers meeting
make me want to give mankind a beating

and you might say it's self-destructive
but, you see, i'd kick the bucket
sixty times before i'd kick the habit

and as the skin rips off i cherish the revolting thought
that even if i quit
there's not a chance in hell i'd stop
and anyone can see the signs
mittens in the summertime
thank you for your pity, you are too kind

and you might say its self-inflicted
but you see that's contradictive
why on earth would anyone practice self destruction?

and pain opinions are sitcom feeding
they dont know that their minds are teething
makes me want to give mankind a beating

i'm tried bandages and sinking
i've tried gloves and even thinking
i've tried vaseline
i've tried everything
and no-one cares if your back is bleeding
they're concerned with their hair receding
looking back it was all maltreating
every thought that occurred misleading

makes me want to give myself a beating....

I know the consequence of putting something like a journal online, and perhaps I take this thing to seriously, but I do feel that it's unfair to become angry over something I put in this. I'm an extremely emotional person, not too mention bipolar. This is my outlet. When I feel something I write it down, I do this at home on a pad of paper, the only difference is with this I have to drive 20min to post anything. I've hurt the feelings of people I care for and that sucks, however, it was all over ONE thing I was feeling at ONE time. That's the point of my journal, I feel something, I write it down, its done, I move on. I dont write out of hate and to hurt people or because I'm genuinely mad, I write to let things out so they don't get bottled up.. i've done too much of that in the past. We ALL get annoyed with friends from time to time, its a fact of life and just because I'm honest enough to admit that for ONE hour I was annoyed doesnt mean I should be persecuted. Yes, I get annoyed with my friends, I do and I'm sorry for that... they cant say they dont get annoyed with me, they do... the point is that we are still friends, I'm not gonna let one thing on my mind change that and dont think they should do that to me. 

I didnt erase my entry, I made it private. I would never erase something I felt at a time in my life. I shouldnt have to do that but I'm being forced into believing that my private thoughts arent fair to have. I have to edit what I write in my journal... does anyone understand how wrong that sounds? Let's face it, I've had some "interesting" livejournal moments, but I've not once deleted an entry because I was sorry... that's just not me. 

I'm not writing any of this out of anger 'cuz there is no reason to be angry. Just getting out my thoughts on journals.
Little worried about work : /  .... I'll keep ya updated.

Wow, what an exciting night. I did not expect to be picked up on the party bus.. but i was! It was soooooo much fun. Did some horrible kareoke, but thats the point of it right? right. Went to Atlanta's bars, very scared I was gonna run into my boss, but I didnt :). The best.. Stanford bar, omg. Everyone was a customer of mine, and one grabbed my penis, I showed I dont know how many people. Oh jeez. I'm gonna have to see everyone of them tomorrow at work ! Really I enjoyed the night with Amber, Mandy, and Jesse. I hope all the bridges are rebuilt, understandable if they arent though.

Fun day at work today, got alot of stupid shit done, well actually it was important, but its all relative right? What does that mean, i hear people say it so I thought I'd be cool too. Guess that failed... so....

 

... how bout this hurricane? As a very important person (and yes I am) I feel it's my civil duty to report my thoughts on everything going on in the world right now. Hurricanes, they rule. I know people lost homes and shit but common.. who's idea was it to build a city below sea level? Or to build on over a swamp, which would make things sink... below sea level. This is a very simple theory and I'm just not sure why the fuckhead didnt see this coming. The thing about America is this, we're greedy pricks. When the tsunami hit, it was horrible, and of course we have to come to the rescue, now Katrina and prolly Rita are being compared to that... what? Right, well I guess a couple hundred/thousand American lives equal the same as 200,000 lives over seas. Gas prices... get the fuck over it already. No one is making much money off of it except in taxes but statistically speaking, we shoulda been paying these prices last year. It's actually the same price compared to what we were paying in the seventies as to what we were making. So ha. You need it, grow up, quit bitching and buy your gas.. and not like its the apocolypse.. if one more person tells me to stock up because its running low I will simply shoot them. Right between the eyes.. recognize fools. The president, hahahaha, 39% approval rating.. good job re-electing him assholes. Is it Hilary's turn yet? Not really, I'm not too sure I'd vote for her, she'd be a killer president, but she'd be labeled the first, it would be deemed a stunt, she deserves better.

This is one of those times I know an update is needed but not sure how to go about it. I dont want to step on any toes, but you have to understand that I can't be afraid of saying things...

I just dont know what to say to start this. How about, ok, I give up. Well not completely. But if you want me to stop the pressure its done. It's been a very long sleepless 48 hours and I realized quite a bit. One - you aren't ready. I could've sworn you were looking for what I was. I was wrong. Even if you were, you weren't looking for it with me.  Two - you didn't mean it. That night, you said.. and I quote "It's not too late" several times. It was. You knew that all along. This hurts the most. The things I did without the thing that shoulda been there... wouldn't have happened if I didn't think it was real. Which brings me to my next realization. Three - I really meant it. I don't like admitting to my feelings but damnit I have them. It took me doing something beyond deceptive to realize this. I got hurt and I did it by losing your trust. I apologize for that. I'm aware that I get a little nuts when it comes to guys. I set things up for disaster. I dont want you to be the next Kyle. I want to continue this friendship. So I leave everything right here. This is the last time I mention it should  you not bring it up. Dont get me wrong... I'm still gonna hope. But I wont let that interfer with my life any longer. So go to him, see if it works, if it's not right I'm still here and will be. Again I'm sorry.

 

And I'm sorry to anyone who reads this b/c the person it's directed too wont so you guys get my whining again. Lucky you : ).

I'm at my mom's for the weekend so i figured I should use this chance to update. Not too mention that urge I have to let my thoughts explode all over this keyboard. So much going on right now. The roomate appears to be either pissed at me or avoiding me, i have no idea for sure. Could have something to do with my previous entry but I had no choice but to write it just as I have no choice but as to write this. My frustrations with home seem to have become too apparent considering they make fun of my anger anymore.. it's a game and apparently I'm the loser.  He's just very rude to me, very ungrateful. He makes you rude and ungrateful. I'm not a baby, dont give me a baby voice... I dont need to be rocked into calmness. 2/3... two fuckin' thirds of his life.. he's here. Probably more. He lives with us without the title of living with us. It's safe for him, he doesnt have to commit to anything particularly you, and rent. All I know is that I work very fuckin' hard so we have a place to live, I do that for him to, the least he could do is show me a little fucking respect for it. He needs to decide what he's doing. He needs to do it VERY quickly before he finds the locks on the door are suddenly different. I'm about to drown financially and he can't even pay $10 bucks a month to abuse my place. I shouldnt post this, its just going to upset people. I can't worry about that anymore though. I'm slipping back into old relaxation habits and I can't do that anymore. There's more to say but I have company coming over.. need to finish this.

Speaking of that company, that situation is just fucked. Here's how that one works.. let's BOTH confess everything we've been feeling and then you can ignore me and brag to my face about your latest conquest. Take it.. crush it... spit on it. Why not, I did it to you, why should you have class when I dont. It was my last chance. Thank you for destroying that. I mean I can do it alone, I always have. I just figured why, when we have something so great, why not share it with each other. I'm not gonna lie, I would kill for something more with you... Of course I'd kill for one of us to have the balls to just call or show up and say "hey, snap outta it, let's do this.", but I just dont think that's gonna happen. You hate alot of things about me, i get that.. i dislike alot about you. I guess we're a little to immature to really discuss this so I'll leave it here. It's in your hands now though. I've made my feelings clear and if you want more from that just let me know but just dont lead me on.

Very rough week for me. Up and down. Something needs to change before I snap out completely. And for once my complaints aren't about work. I just dont understand anyone anymore. The disrespect toward me has more than doubled to the point to where I don't feel human anymore. I'm just this drone that works his ass off and then comes home to be barraded with phone calls and finally fall asleep  and do it all over again. And sleep is no longer a relief, the dreams are so vivid and so true to what is going on. It depresses me cuz I know it's how things are, and how things will end. I'm so happy and yet so emotionally detached... yeah, I've got one hand in my pocket blah blah blah. The answer is No. I'm not. I won't be. You can't make me. The other answer is Completely. Of course. You can't stop me. They aren't the answers either of you wanted, but there they are. I apologize. Explosions are definetly coming. I cant drink around people because secrets are revealed and I look like an ass. But that's just it. I'm always gonna be the ass. I don't even care. I like the Killers new video, it's pretty, harder than shit to find somewhere to download it though. Colored cigarettes are so stupid, why does mom smoke them. Why does she smoke them around the baby who is allergic to them? I guess that explains so much as to who I am. I am her son. Ew. I'm so sick of whining. I really am. But damnit, if things could just be right I wouldn't have to. Fuck you livejournal, I love you.

Wow, what a great day I'm having. Official first day after the big promotion, and when I say big, I mean BIG raise. Jesus I love it. But honestly I dont want to talk about that right now, I'd like to discuss people.  People in general are drawn to chaos, to supposed drama. Yet when the slightest bit happens near me, I'm an attention whore. Wow, how to describe this weekend. Unbelievable? Yup, that sounds right. So Kiley and I leave late for the Bright Eyes show, thinking we're gonna be so far back, we get there and we are FIRST. I kid you not. So we sat against the wall thinking they wouldnt let us sit by the door... WRONG. A big group came up and squatted there. So we didnt get in first, still front row so fuck it. Ok and Conor.. he walked by us outside the theatre. It was so surreal. Like a few ppl freaked out and he just kinda looked away, but he smiled and looked at those of us who kept our cool! Gah, like just the thought of him actually seeing me even for a moment.. i was in his head lol. So that was all good. The Faint were amazing. I was so very impressed. We left the rail after them, Didnt really feel the need to be that close to hear Bright Eyes, I know that sounds shitty, but he doesnt even really respect his fans so I prefer to take him in from a distance, keeps it less personal. 

Tired. I'll write about father's wedding tomorrow. Later.

Anyways. Bright Eyes tomorrow. I've pretty suppressed all my excitment for now. It'll kick in at about 6pm tomorrow. I really can't wait for the Faint too. They are quite lovely and I'm sure they'll put on a good show. Ok, i have nothing else to say so later.
